sample_name: NASA Rodent Research 9 (RR9) and Rodent Research 1 (RR1) Mission Muscle Samples
amount_of_protein_loaded: Varies by protein assessed, e.g., 2.5 mg for SERCA
type_of_gel: SDS-PAGE using TGX BioRad PreCast 4–15% gradient gels for most proteins; tricine-based SDS-PAGE for SLN
instrument_for_gel: BioRad Transblot Turbo for PVDF membrane transfers
type_of_transfer_membrane: PVDF for most proteins, nitrocellulose for SLN
transfer_method: Wet-transfer for SLN, BioRad Transblot Turbo for others
blocking_chemical: Everyblot blocking solution, 5 min at room temperature
blocking_wash_duration: Three washes, specific duration not mentioned
number_of_biological_markers: Multiple, including SERCA1a, SERCA2a, PLN, SLN, NNAT, MHC IIa, IIx, IIb
marker_type: Protein markers relevant to muscle function and regulatory proteins
protein_labeled: Myosin Heavy Chain (MHC) IIa, IIx, IIb
primary_company_and_product_number: Various, including ThermoFisher Scientific, Sigma Aldrich, Proteintech
secondary_antigen_host: Anti-mouse or anti-rabbit, depending on primary
imaging_substrate: Immobilon® ECL Ultra Western HRP Substrate
quantification_stain: Ponceau S for total protein load normalization
